<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rod of Wonder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=265)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Chaotic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=25" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 575 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 465 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This peculiar rod is strange and unpredictable. Each time it is activated, it produces one of a variety of effects at random.
